data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during BADGER cruise from Madeira to River Gambia started at 1752-07-25

Ship: Badger (Snow), Start of voyage: 1752-07-25, End of voyage: 1752-08-17, Voyage: Madeira - River Gambia, 1st Observer: Thomas Hankenson (Captain), 2nd Observer: Francis Swanston (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 10G 268BM SWALLOW CLASS
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
